brainly_data.question:
Read the following excerpt from a news article:

Damion has shown the patience of Job in waiting for the zoning board to decide about his home addition.

The mention of Job is which of the following references?
a) Biblical
b) Historical
c) Mythological
d) Pop culture
brainly_data.subject: English

all_answers.subject: English
all_answers.text: I'm thinking it's mythological hope this helps
